articles.heading: Yishensu Groceries, Ipoh Offers You A Wide Range Of Healthy, Nutritious And Tast..
articles.deasc: Yishensu Groceries, Ipoh offers you a wide range of healthy, nutritious and tasty vegetarian products! Explore Yishensu's exclusive range of groceries, as well as meat-free retail products from popular brands. Enjoy 10% off at their Ipoh store:

articles.heading: The Top 7 Smartest Animals
articles.deasc: Animals are really smart! 😍

articles.deasc: Looking for interesting creamy plant-based potatoes recipes?

articles.heading: The Ultimate Guide To Going Vegan In A Non-vegan Household - Animal Outlook
articles.deasc: Want to go vegan, but your loved ones are big meat eaters? Here’s a few tips and strategies to make your switch to veganism as smooth and havoc-free as possible, and most importantly, enjoyable. Read our new blog for more:

articles.heading: Undercover Investigation At Live Markets In Bay Area Reveals Hidden Abuse And Cruelty
articles.deasc: Right across the San Francisco Bay Area are dozens of live markets where animals are sold live or slaughtered and sold right to customers. Our undercover investigators visited 18 live markers in San Francisco, San Jose, and Oakland and were shocked by what they saw. Read more from One Green Planet:..

articles.heading: In The First 6 Months Of 2022, You Helped Impact Over163.9 Million Animals. Over..
articles.deasc: In the first 6 months of 2022, you helped impact over❗️163.9 million animals❗️ 💙Over 50,000 people showed their support to end the sale of foie gras in the U.S. 🐷More than 32,000 people were inspired to go plant-based with the help of LoveVeg.com. 🐥Over 50 million farmed animals are now protecte..

articles.heading: All Animals Deserve To Be Happy. Let''s Continue To Create A Loving World For Ani..
articles.deasc: All animals deserve to be happy. Let's continue to create a loving world for animals everywhere. #animalrights #GoVegan

articles.heading: Every Person Who Observes Meatless Mondays Reduces Their Carbon Footprint By Eig..
articles.deasc: Every person who observes Meatless Mondays reduces their carbon footprint by eight pounds per day - the same impact as not driving for two days - and also saves 28 land and 175 aquatic animals per year. Read more about how eating sustainably can combat #climatechange:

articles.heading: Studies Have Shown That Plant-based Foods Have Much Less Of A Negative Climate I..
articles.deasc: Studies have shown that plant-based foods have much less of a negative climate impact compared to meat and animal products. Animal agriculture is both unethical and unsustainable. #goveganfortheplanet #goveganfortheanimals Learn more about the way animal products negatively impact the planet:

articles.heading: Every Person Who Observes Meatless Mondays Reduces Their Carbon Footprint By Eig..
